Literature.Title: Total structures and antimicrobial activity of bacitracin minor components.
Literature.Author: Ikai Y, Oka H, Hayakawa J, Matsumoto M, Saito M, Harada K, Mayumi Y, Suzuki M

Literature.Title: Bacitracin Susceptibility and Minimum Inhibitory Concentration (MIC) Data

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=0.39µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(no activity data),Escherichia coli IFO 3806(no activity data),Bacteroides fragilis(MIC=>8µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile(MIC=>256µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Clostridium spiroforme(MIC=4->8µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=0.04-12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=<=1120µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>8-1560µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=55µg/ml),Fusobacterium necrophorum(MIC=9.4-100µg/ml),Haemophilus Influenzae(MIC=>16-400µg/ml),Listeria innocua(MIC=50µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=32µg/ml),Moraxella catarrhalis(MIC=1-4µg/ml),Neisseria gonorrhoeae(MIC=800µg/ml),Penicillium oxalicum(MIC=50µg/ml),Propionibacterium freudenreichii(MIC=<1µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris(MIC=700µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=700µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MIC=1560-3120µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=<=1120-3120µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=<=0.03-700µg/ml),Staphylococcus auricularis(MIC=0.25-128µg/ml),Staphylococcus capitis(MIC=0.25->128µg/ml),Staphylococcus caprae(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus cohnii(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=0.25->16µg/ml),Staphylococcus haemolyticus(MIC=0.25->128µg/ml),Staphylococcus hominis(MIC=0.25-16µg/ml),Staphylococcus intermedius(MIC=0.25-128µg/ml),Staphylococcus lugdunensis(MIC=0.25->4µg/ml),Staphylococcus saprophyticus(MIC=0.25->128µg/ml),Staphylococcus sciuri(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus simulans(MIC=0.25-128µg/ml),Staphylococcus warneri(MIC=0.25->128µg/ml),Staphylococcus xylosus LQC 5156(MIC=>128µg/ml),Streptococcus sp.(MIC=2->16µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=2->16µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=0.06->16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=0.5->16µg/ml),Brachyspira hyodysenteriae(MIC=12.5-50µg/ml)
